hero.headline: MEMBERSHIP
hero.subtext:
Make changes to or start your membership on the Redpoint Member Portal!

Purchase a membership, update contact information or billing, temporarily freeze your account or request to cancel.

pricing.headline: START YOUR MEMBERSHIP TODAY FOR ONLY
pricing.billingText:
We prorate your first month of membership, which means you're only paying for the remaining days of the month. Then, it's just $80/month, billed on the first of every month.

There's no contracts, start-up or cancellation fees - so cancel anytime, no strings attached. Cancellation requests will go into effect prior to the next billing cycle. You can enjoy your membership for the remainder of the month, with no worries about it charging you for the next month. All change requests must be submitted at least 5 days prior to billing (usually the 25th of the month), to ensure that we're able to process them in time.

If you're planning on taking a break, consider our Freeze option instead. Freezing is only $8/month and allows you to easily restart your membership anytime - just pay for the rest of the month & you're good to go!

We only prorate once, so Cancelled members will have to pay the full membership price when they reactivate their account

benefits.title: ONE FREE MONTHLY GUEST PASS
benefits.description: Additional guest passes available for $15 each. Bring up to 3 guests at one time

benefits.title: FREE YOGA + FITNESS CLASSES
benefits.description: At least one class offered every single day

benefits.title: 20% OFF ALL PRODUCTS IN OUR GEAR SHOP
MEMBER KEY TAG FOR SPECIAL DISCOUNTS AT LOCAL BUSINESSES
benefits.description: Check out all of the spots below!

localDiscounts.headline: LOCAL DISCOUNTS
localDiscounts.intro: Bring your member key tag to any of our local partners for a discount on your order! Click on the icons for address, hours, and more info.

partners15.name: Afternoon Cafe
partners15.description: Info and stuff about the business - what they sell, how their discount works etc.

bottomCta.headline: START YOUR MEMBERSHIP TODAY FOR $XX
bottomCta.description:
Then $80/month billed on the first of every month. Only pay for the remaining days of this month, then cancel anytime with no contract or additional fees.

Get immediate access to members-only perks, like local discounts, free classes, and unlimited climbing!

Come in today or sign up on Redpoint HQ.
